name: Realm of the Dread Sorceress
description:
Inspired by the RPG games of my youth, I invite you to:

  • EXPLORE a mysterious realm;
  • UNCOVER the hideout of a renegade cat-lord;
  • COLLECT gifts for the Dread Sorceress;
  • DETERMINE why these Vikings are so drunk;
  • LISTEN TO skeletons, ghosts, and even people;
  • RECONCILE an inter-species couple;
  • FETCH some milk;
  • FIND OUT where the signs you always see in Bitsy games actually come from;
  • JUST WHAT are those little bird people anyway?

Note: this piece is a bit longer than most Bitsy games - please allow yourself a bit of space for exploration.
